name: For Rent
description:
Demo release date 01.11.2016 General Genre: Horror
Platform: PC
Game engine: Unity 5.4 Team

- Maria Shchurova (scripting, scenario, concepts, game design, build)
- Vyacheslav Permyakov (2D/3D models, textures, animations, sound design)
- Bogdan Drosdov (3D models, textures)

Game Concept

First person horror game, featuring exploration, puzzles, combat and cutscenes. The setting of the game is a Soviet apartment building, with many nostalgic details such as Soviet household items familiar to many people in post-Soviet space. This style was chosen to be touching for the local audience and unusual for foreign players.

Further development

Development was suspended at the stage of moving the project from Unity 3D to the Unreal Engine. Work can be resumed in the future, provided the recruitment of a new team.
